forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some morning fog. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
